org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.plugin

Class AbstractThreadedLocalReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.util.Observable<T>
      • org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.plugin.AbstractLoggedObservable<ReaderEvent>
        • org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.event.AbstractObservableReader
          • org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.plugin.AbstractLocalReader
            • org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.plugin.AbstractThreadedLocalReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProxyReader, NameableConfigurable

    public abstract class AbstractThreadedLocalReader
extends AbstractLocalReader
    Abstract definition of an threader local reader. Factorizes the observation mechanism through the implementation of a monitoring thread.

      • waitForCardPresent

        public abstract boolean waitForCardPresent(long timeout)
                                    throws javax.smartcardio.CardException
        Waits for a card. Returns true if a card is detected before the end of the provided timeout. Returns false if no card detected within the delay.
        Parameters:
        timeout -
        Returns:
        presence status
        Throws:
        javax.smartcardio.CardException

      • waitForCardAbsent

        public abstract boolean waitForCardAbsent(long timeout)
                                   throws javax.smartcardio.CardException,
                                          IOReaderException
        Wait until the card disappears. Returns true if a card has disappeared before the end of the provided timeout. Returns false if the is still present within the delay. Closes the physical channel when the card has disappeared.
        Parameters:
        timeout -
        Returns:
        presence status
        Throws:
        javax.smartcardio.CardException
        IOReaderException
